page.title: 03ECONOMICS
page.content: ECONOMICS There is neither a bank nor a buiding society. The Sub-Post Office in Woodseaves is the only one still functioning,the Sub-Post Office which formerly existed in Shebdon having closed and reverted to a dwelling. The rateable value of a typical dwelling is Â£300 which requires a total payment of Â£456 per year. Included in this is a payment of 2.1 pence per pound of rateable value to the High Offley parish council. The cost of travelling to Stafford by bus is 65p.single and Â£1.20 return. An average dwelling costs Â£35,000 and the price of agricultural land is Â£1500 to Â£2000 per acre.
